circumstances: While cruising under VFR mode, the crew encountered poor weather conditions with clouds, turbulences and thunderstorm activity. The airplane suffered overload failure, disintegrated in the air and crashed in Ashdown. The wreckage was found a day later. All three occupants have been killed.
probable_cause:
Airframe failure in flight after the crew continued VFR flight into adverse weather conditions. The following contributing factors were reported: 
- Overload failure,
- Thunderstorm activity,
- Turbulences associated with clouds and thunderstorms, 
- Separation in flight,
- Sky obscured,
- Visibility half a mile or less, 
- Aircraft disintegrated.
